mapper.insert: insert into t_priv_data (user_id, priv_code, priv_type, dmlflag, dmltime) values (#{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{privCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dmlflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{dmltime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
